item.title: Eglot for better programming experience in Emacs
item.author: whatacold@gmail.com (whatacold)
item.description: LSP, or Language Server Protocol, makes programming easier by features like better auto-completion and definition lookup. It may have scratched your itches, and you are wondering what the experience is like in Emacs.
